data.text:
Books I have started are in bold. Books already on my shelf are signified by a 0. Books I need to purchase are signified by a $. Notes on why I added the book to my TBR are in (parenthesis). These are all really notes for me.

Yes, I know it is an unrealistic goal.

At top, the titles I am hoping to read this year (again, not quite realistic), interspersed with book club reads.
